statements: SELECT * FROM InfluencerEngagement;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM InfluencerEngagement;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name FROM InfluencerEngagement ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerEngagement WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM InfluencerEngagement WHERE engagement_rate < 5.0;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM InfluencerEngagement WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM InfluencerEngagement WHERE engagement_rate < 5 ORDER BY influencer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerEngagement WHERE followers_count BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM InfluencerEngagement WHERE influencer_id = 3;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM InfluencerEngagement WHERE followers_count > 1000 AND engagement_rate > 3 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT * FROM AudienceEngagement WHERE engagement_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count < 5000 ORDER BY followers_count ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM AudienceEngagement WHERE comments_count > 50 AND likes_count > 100 ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;

SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers JOIN AudienceEngagement ON Influencers.influencer_id = AudienceEngagement.influencer_id WHERE AudienceEngagement.likes_count > 200 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;

SELECT influencer_name, engagement_date, likes_count, comments_count FROM Influencers JOIN AudienceEngagement ON Influencers.influencer_id = AudienceEngagement.influencer_id WHERE engagement_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE influencers_id IN (SELECT influencer_id FROM AudienceEngagement WHERE likes_count > 150 ORDER BY likes_count DESC);
SELECT * FROM Influencers
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers DESC
SELECT name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 10000
SELECT audience_name, location FROM Audience WHERE age_range = '18-24'
SELECT i.name, e.likes FROM Influencers i JOIN EngagementData e ON i.id = e.influencer_id
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 1000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencers WHERE id = 5
SELECT * FROM Audience WHERE age_range = '18-25' AND location = 'USA'
SELECT id, name, followers, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY followers ASC

SELECT Influencers.name, Audience.audience_name, EngagementData.likes FROM Influencers JOIN EngagementData ON Influencers.id = EngagementData.influencer_id JOIN Audience ON Audience.id = EngagementData.audience_id
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencers WHERE follower_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 500 ORDER BY post_id DESC;

SELECT influencer_name, audience_id, age_group FROM influencers JOIN audience_demographics ON influencers.influencer_id = audience_demographics.influencer_id WHERE age_group = '18-24' ORDER BY influencer_name ASC;

SELECT influencer_name, post_content, comment_text FROM influencers JOIN posts ON influencers.influencer_id = posts.influencer_id JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id WHERE comments_count > 10 ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE follower_count > 1000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE follower_count BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT influencer_name, location, gender FROM influencers i JOIN audience_demographics a ON i.influencer_id = a.influencer_id WHERE a.age_group = '18-24';

SELECT p.post_content, p.likes_count, p.comments_count, i.influencer_name FROM posts p JOIN influencers i ON p.influencer_id = i.influencer_id WHERE p.likes_count > 100 ORDER BY p.likes_count DESC, p.comments_count ASC;

SELECT c.commenter_name, c.comment_text, c.comment_date, p.post_content, i.influencer_name FROM comments c JOIN posts p ON c.post_id = p.post_id JOIN influencers i ON p.influencer_id = i.influencer_id WHERE i.follower_count > 5000 ORDER BY c.comment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000
SELECT * FROM Posts WHERE likes_count > 500 ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT commenter_name, comment_text FROM Comments WHERE comment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM Posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, likes_count, comments_count FROM Influencers JOIN Posts ON Influencers.influencer_id = Posts.influencer_id WHERE influencer_name LIKE 'A%' AND likes_count > 500;
SELECT commenter_name, comment_text, comment_date FROM Comments WHERE comment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY comment_date ASC;
